svg.text: • Key Size: 56 bits (64 bits with parity)

svg.text: 1. Choose two large prime numbers p and q
5. Compute d (private exponent): d × e ≡ 1 (mod φ(n))

svg.text: • Security depends on factoring large numbers

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;

svg.text: • Migrate to AES as soon as possible

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;

svg.text: from Crypto.Cipher import DES; cipher = DES.new(key, DES.MODE_ECB)

text.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;

svg.text: DES is deprecated; use AES for symmetric encryption and RSA (2048+ bits) for asymmetric operations
